code_value: Questions 1~2  You have missed a wonderful concert. Ask one of your friends who has been there two questions for some information.</br>Questions 3~4  Your friend has won first prize in a model plane competition. Ask him two questions for more information.
Questions 1~2  You have missed a wonderful concert. Ask one of your friends who has been there two questions for some information.
Questions 3~4  Your friend has won first prize in a model plane competition. Ask him two questions for more information.
